articles.title: Lisandro Martinez skips wedding reception of Argentina teammate Nicolas Tagliafico as Manchester United confirm his return to training after World Cup triumph

articles.content:
Lisandro Martinez missed Nicolas Tagliafico’s wedding reception in order to return to training for Manchester United.
Erik ten Hag’s side have confirmed that the defender is back at Carrington following his World Cup success with Argentina in Qatar.

articles.title: Lionel Messi's Qatar Room To Be Turned Into Museum After Argentina's Triumph At FIFA World Cup 2022
articles.description: Argentina won their third World Cup and Messi's first of his career after a stunning triumph over France in the 2022 championship game.
articles.content:
Argentine star Lionel Messi's hotel room in Qatar, where he stayed during the 2022 FIFA World Cup, will be transformed into a museum as announced by Qatar University on Wednesday.

articles.description: Featuring Argentina's updated 3-star log, Martinez's tattoo reads "Que la pasión te lleve a la gloria", which translates to "May passion lead you to glory."

articles.content:
